name: The Suite Spot Salon
tools: Figma | React.JS, Node.JS, Express.JS, MongoDB Atlas
shortSummary: A salon website where users can conveniently book appointments, purchase items from the shop, and manage their accounts.
summary: The Suite Spot Salon is a fictitious salon suite client developed by our team for our senior design project. Recognizing the importance of booking features in the salon industry, we aimed to address this gap in the market. Our website allows users to conveniently book appointments, purchase items from the shop, and manage their accounts.
tasks: Collaborated with a team to create low-fi and hi-fi prototypes
Implemented mobile-first design approach with two hi-fi prototypes
Generated comprehensive documentation outlining the design process
Ensured consistency and accessibility throughout the design phase
Conducted user testings to improve design
Collaborated with a team to create a fully functional website based on design
Documented the development project
Developed Front end and back end
Set up database and API
Developed responsive front-end
Deployed website

name: Noodletopia
shortSummary: An app designed for noodle enthusiasts, offering a personalized experience for ordering and creating customized noodle bowls.
summary: Noodletopia is a mobile application designed for noodle enthusiasts, offering a personalized experience for ordering and creating customized noodle bowls with various toppings. Users have the freedom to add reviews for their noodle creations and share their unique combinations with others. Additionally, they can save their favorite noodle bowls for easy access.
tasks: Created hi-fi Prototype
Ensured consistency and accessibility throughout the design phase
Conducted user testings throughout hi-fi development to improve design

name: Domino's Accessibility Redesign
shortSummary: A redesign of Domino's home page to improve accessibility.
summary: The Domino's website appears cluttered, leading to cognitive overload even for those without disabilities. Additionally, visibility issues arise from text blending with images or being too small to read. My redesign of Domino's homepage focuses on maintaining the same content while reducing cognitive overload and improving visibility.
tasks: Created a simple redesign
Ensured consistency and accessibility throughout the design phase

name: UCF App Redesign
shortSummary: A redesign of UCF's mobile app to improve accessibility and user access.
summary: The UCF mobile app suffers from excessive visual and informational clutter, making it challenging to read and locate items. The abundance of colors and disorganized icons contribute to this problem, which can be particularly overwhelming for users prone to cognitive overload. This problem ultimately defeats the app's purpose as a tool for quick access to the university's services.
tasks: Created a simple redesign
Ensured consistency and accessibility throughout the design phase
Overhauled navigation system

name: Book Store App
shortSummary: An app based on the Writer's Block Bookstore website with updated visuals and  new social features.
summary: The Writer's Block Bookstore app was derived from the existing Writer's  Block Bookstore website, undergoing a transformation into a more social  and interactive platform. With a diverse array of capabilities, users  can seamlessly share, save, and rate content, along with managing their  accounts. These integrated features significantly enhance user  engagement through fostering social interactions, thereby enriching the  overall user experience.

name: Salon Business Card
shortSummary: A business card design for a real salon business in Tampa, FL.
summary: My task involved redesigning a business card for a salon business located in Tampa, FL. The client sought both design enhancements and  updated information on their cards. To meet their needs, I presented two  design options: one resembling their previous card but with refreshed  visuals and updated details, and another that explored more experimental  elements.
tasks: Refreshed visuals for the client's business card
Enhanced legibility of the business card content
Reinforced brand identity through the redesigned business card
